original_title: Constitutional Council to meet on Friday (24)
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Constitutional Council is scheduled to meet on Friday (24), chaired by Speaker Mahinda Yapa Abeywardana.
The Speaker said the appointment of new members to independent commissions will be discussed at the meeting.
New members are set to be appointed to 10 independent commissions.
Speaker Mahinda Yapa Abeywardana said the applications have been evaluated.
Those guilty of Economic Crimes should be investigated under proposed Anti Corruption Act – Samagi Youth Lawyers Movement
F1 champ Nelson Piquet fined $1 million for homophobic, racist insults on 7-time F1 champ Lewis Hamilton
Price of milk tea reduced to Rs. 90 from Monday (27) – All Ceylon Restaurant Owners Association
